title: Appleseed (Dub)
description: Growing out of the chaos of a global war, the city of Utopia is populated by humans and bioroids (artificial humans). On the surface, everything is harmonious, but tensions lurk. Into this seemingly perfect society comes a survivor of the wars, Deunan Knute, who carries a legacy that will turn out to be of critical importance to the future of humanity.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Mecha>, <Genre -> Military>, <Genre -> Police>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>, <Genre -> Shounen>]
